verses.verse: Maschil of Asaph. O <S%H430>God<s%>, why hast thou cast us <S%H2186>off<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>? Why doth thine <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of thy <S%H4830>pasture<s%>?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> thy <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, which thou hast <S%H7069>gotten<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>, <S%H7626>Which<s%> thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> to be the tribe of thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>; And <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, wherein thou hast <S%H7931>dwelt<s%>.
Lift <S%H7311>up<s%> thy <S%H6471>feet<s%> unto the <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H4876>ruins<s%>, All the <S%H7489>evil<s%> that the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath done in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.
Thine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> have <S%H7580>roared<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thine <S%H4150>assembly<s%>; They have set <S%H7760>up<s%> their <S%H226>ensigns<s%> for <S%H226>signs<s%>.
They <S%H3045>seemed<s%> as men that lifted <S%H935>up<s%> <S%H7134>Axes<s%> upon a <S%H5442>thicket<s%> of <S%H6086>trees<s%>.
And <S%H3162>now<s%> all the carved <S%H6603>work<s%> thereof They break <S%H1986>down<s%> with <S%H3781>hatchet<s%> and <S%H3597>hammers<s%>.

They have <S%H7971>set<s%> thy <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>; They have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H4908>dwelling-place<s%> of thy <S%H8034>name<s%> by casting it to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

They <S%H559>said<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, Let us make <S%H3238>havoc<s%> of them <S%H3162>altogether<s%>: They have burned <S%H8313>up<s%> all the <S%H4150>synagogues<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
We <S%H7200>see<s%> not our <S%H226>signs<s%>: There is no more any <S%H5030>prophet<s%>; Neither is there among us any that <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%>.
How <S%H430>long<s%>, O God, shall the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%>? Shall the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H5006>blaspheme<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>?
Why <S%H7725>drawest<s%> thou back thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, even thy right <S%H3027>hand<s%>? <S%H3615>Pluck<s%> it out <S%H7130>of<s%> thy bosom and consume <S%H2436>them<s%>.
Yet <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>, <S%H6466>Working<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Thou didst <S%H6565>divide<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>: Thou <S%H7665>brakest<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H8577>sea-monsters<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

Thou <S%H7533>brakest<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> in <S%H5414>pieces<s%>; Thou gavest him to be <S%H3978>food<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> inhabiting the <S%H6728>wilderness<s%>.
Thou didst <S%H1234>cleave<s%> <S%H4599>fountain<s%> and <S%H5158>flood<s%>: Thou driedst <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.
The <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H3915>thine<s%>, the night also is <S%H3559>thine<s%>: Thou hast prepared the <S%H3974>light<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5324>set<s%> all the <S%H1367>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: Thou hast <S%H3335>made<s%> <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter<s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H341>this<s%>, that the enemy hath <S%H2778>reproached<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And that a <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> hath <S%H5006>blasphemed<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

Oh <S%H5414>deliver<s%> not the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of thy <S%H8449>turtle-dove<s%> unto the wild <S%H2416>beast<s%>: <S%H7911>Forget<s%> not the <S%H2416>life<s%> of thy <S%H6041>poor<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>.
Have <S%H5027>respect<s%> unto the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>; For the <S%H4285>dark<s%> places of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%>.
Oh let not the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3637>ashamed<s%>: Let the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H7378>plead<s%> thine own <S%H7379>cause<s%>: <S%H2142>Remember<s%> how the foolish <S%H5036>man<s%> <S%H2781>reproacheth<s%> thee all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Forget <S%H7911><s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%>: The <S%H7588>tumult<s%> of those that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against thee <S%H5927>ascendeth<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
